thread.title: Phillauri box office collection day 2: Anushka Sharma, Diljit Dosanjh’s ghostly chemistry earns Rs 9.22 cr
thread.title_full: Phillauri box office collection day 2: Anushka Sharma, Diljit Dosanjh’s ghostly chemistry earns Rs 9.22 cr

author: FE Online
title: Phillauri box office collection day 2: Anushka Sharma, Diljit Dosanjh’s ghostly chemistry earns Rs 9.22 cr
text:
Phillauri box office collection day 2: Anushka Sharma, Diljit Dosanjh’s ghostly chemistry earns Rs 9.22 cr Phillauri box office collection day 2: Anushka Sharma, Diljit Dosanjh’s ghostly chemistry earns Rs 9.22 cr Directed by Anshai Lal, the Anushka Sharma and Diljit Dosanjh starrer-Phillauri is on its way to a good first weekend having earned Rs 9.22 till Day 2. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: March 26, 2017 3:07 PM A still from the movie. (Bollywood Hungama) 
Directed by Anshai Lal, the Anushka Sharma and Diljit Dosanjh starrer-Phillauri is on its way to a good first weekend having earned Rs 9.22 cr till Day 2. This is the second film from the NH10 actress’s home production, Clean Slate Films. The movie earned Rs 4.02 cr on its opening day and Rs 5.20 cr on day 2, creating an aggregate box office collection of Rs 9.22 cr till date. Featuring Anushka Sharma as a spirit named Shashi, who lives within the tree, the film is an unusual love story that runs parallels between two eras. The movie was able to bring a huge audience to the theatres in North India, especially in Punjab, Delhi NCR and Haryana, according to a Bollywood Hungama Report. One of the reason due to which the movie worked in these regions in the presence of singer-actor Diljit Dosanjh in the film. 
Hindi movie critic and analyst Taran Adarsh shared the collection of the movie on twitter- He wrote, “#Phillauri is STRONG in North, the key contributor… Biz saw growth on Sat… Sun crucial… Fri 4.02 cr, Sat 5.20 cr. Total: ₹ 9.22 cr.” #Phillauri is STRONG in North, the key contributor… Biz saw growth on Sat… Sun crucial… Fri 4.02 cr, Sat 5.20 cr. Total: ₹ 9.22 cr. 
— taran adarsh (@taran_adarsh) March 26, 2017 
About the movie’s collection in the UAE, he wrote, “#Phillauri opens well in UAE-GCC. Collects $ 260,000 [Rs 1.70 cr] on Thu + Fri [witnessed 40% growth].” #Phillauri opens well in UAE-GCC. Collects $ 260,000 [₹ 1.70 cr] on Thu + Fri [witnessed 40% growth]. 
— taran adarsh (@taran_adarsh) March 25, 2017 
You may also want to watch- 
According to an Indian Express report, Phillauri director Anshai Lal in a recent interview said, “As Anushka is part of the film, I am in a way confident about the fate of the film. When you have an A-list actor things become easier in terms of reach. It’s a blessing to be working with these talented actors. When you are sure about the script, actors respect it and then things just flow. They have the experience to elevate the material to another level.I t is easier to communicate when you have a fresh casting as it doesn’t have the baggage of an actor doing certain kind of roles, you don’t have to break stereotypes.” 
About the film: 
Said to be based on Tim Burton’s 2005 fantasy/romance movie The Corpse’s Bride, Phillauri is one of its kind movie. The film revolves around Kanan who is forced to marry a tree to cleanse away his bad luck. Thinga take a turn when he finds out the he is now married to a spirit named Shashi, who lived in that tree. The story unfolds as giving away details about Shashi’s past life. 
Apart from Anushka Sharma and Diljit Dosanjh, the movie also features Suraj Sharma and Mehrene Kaur Pirzada in supporting roles. Please Wait while comments are loading... Trending Now
